artist: Artist: After Titian (Tiziano Vecelli); Draftsman: Sébastien Leroy; Etcher: Alexis Chataigner; Engraver: Jean Dambrun
description: Virgin and Child with St. Catherine and a rabbit. Virgin seated at center foreground petting a rabbit and looking at Child; St. Catherine at left holding Child; distance right shepherd petting a bleack lamb; in a landscape
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

in margin in black:No. 493   TITIEN  Eco\'le Itali\'ne/ Des\'e S. Lee Roi  gra\'ve a la Eau-forte par Chataigner  Term\'e par Dambrun / LA VIERGE AU LAPIN  | on sheet in pencil: 2-408    2-481
portfolio: From Galerie du Musee Napoleon; Galerie Napoleon; Galerie du Musee de France
title: La Vergine au Lapin
